**Suggested Readings for Pandas**

-   PDS VanderPlas

-   [Ch. 4: Data Manipulation with Pandas](https://jakevdp.github.io/PythonDataScienceHandbook/03.00-introduction-to-pandas.html)

And all our lecture notes!
